name: うっかりペネロペ  (2007)
summary:
In 2007 two newly made episodes following the Ukkari Penelope television series were released as part of a Gift Box to commemorate the approaching Christmas. Both episodes were shown later on TV on NHK shortly prior to Christmas on December, 22.
1.Merry Christmas Penelope
2.Christmas Party
